description: Mass rallies over the murder of a teacher mask growing dissent over the country's secular identity.
title: Samuel Paty: Beheading of teacher deepens divisions over France's secular identity
title_page: Samuel Paty: Beheading of teacher deepens divisions over France's secular identity - BBC News
maintext: "We need to be more responsive as soon as there is a student who poses a problem in class, such as rejoicing in a terrorist act," he told me. "We need to deal with it quickly before it spills over onto the internet and a death threat for the teacher."
